articles.description: A cursory glance at the data shows outperformance is not centred on a single sector but across industries. Some of the biggest gainers come from auto ancillaries, capital goods, chemicals, construction materials and realty, IT and healthcare
articles.content:
Even though the recent rally in the market has been broad-based, small-cap stocks have been outperforming their larger peers, hinting that investors see growth coming from smaller companies.

articles.title: Elon Musk challenges Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal to public debate: Here's why - India Today
articles.description: Elon Musk was replying to a fan's tweet summarising the highlights of his initial $44 billion offer to buy Twitter. Musk has backed out of the deal as he believes Twitter did not reveal correct data.

articles.title: Sebi mulls stock payment system bypassing brokers - Economic Times
